articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.title: Hashmatullah Shahidi fails to recover from aftershock of Glenn Maxwell's innings, makes a statement after elimination from WC - Crictoday.com (Cricket News)
articles.description: Afghanistan gave a tough fight to South Africa but lost the game by 5 wickets to bow out of the ICC World Cup 2023.
articles.content: Afghanistan gave a tough fight to South Africa but lost the game by 5 wickets to bow out of the ICC World Cup 2023. Captain Hashmatullah Shahidi rued his team’s 3-wicket defeat against Australia in t… [+737 chars]
